sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Dillo package contains dillo dpid and dpidc.

sect3.title: dillo
sect3.para: dillo is a GTK+ graphical WWW browser with limited facilities, but a small footprint and runs fast on slower machines.

sect3.title: dpid
sect3.para: dpid is a Dillo plugin daemon.

sect3.title: dpidc
sect3.para: dpidc is a control program for dpid.
